unit: Unit 6 | Inference for Categorical Data: Proportions
title: Margin of Error: Female Karate Students
question_text: There are $250$ children signed up for karate at the local studio. Of those, $70\%$ are boys and $30\%$ are girls. Assume a $95\%$ level of confidence and that these $250$ students represent a random sample of all children signed up for karate. What is the margin of error for the percentage of girls taking karate?
